content.description: Stand start with hands matched on good holds. Find your feet and stand up to a good crimp. Bring your left foot up to the big foot and throw up to the arête just under the lip. Move your feet around and go for the top. Top out the problem.
content.location: When looking at Hang Ten walk around the right side of the boulder to the backside climb the arête.

content.description: Gain slab via step up to large jug.  Match crimps then grab a jug and throw to the top.  Kinda scary.
content.protection: Pad or two, but if you fall wrong they won't keep you off the slab anyway.
content.location: From trail 4 take the side trail leading toward Smiley and the 45.  After a short walk up hill you'll come to an inobvious fork in the trail.  Take the right fork.  This will lead you to Soul Assasin, Hang Ten, Etc.

content.description:
Stand with hands matched in the seam. Move feet up and toss to the top. Find good feet and top out.  

  There is also a lower start with a tiny crimp and the arête. It doesn't add much but it could be fun to play around on. Have fun.
content.location: To the left of Soul Assassin V6 on the backside arête.

content.description: A big sized boulder with a slab underneath it and it's the only boulder in this area. It has the classics Hang Ten V2 and Soul Assassin V6 on it.
